Articles.Content:
Hey guys I was a little bored today and I decided to make a small vehicle to drive around the space center.

So now I am creating this post to inform you that you can enter a race around the space center.

Contest rules!

1) Must be under 50 parts.

2) At least 1 Kerbal has to be in your vehicle the entire race.

3) No rockets or RCS are allowed.

4) Must follow the path provided, you cannot touch the grass or the sidewalks: MAPhttp://imgur.com/pZIeFfiMAP

5) Video evidence isn't required but it really helps validate your entry.

6) Contest ends February 28 at 11:59 pm.

My own entry:

My own time; 3:14

Edited February 17, 2014 by Khrynn
Forgot to add my time.
You may want to use PersistentTrails for recording tracks and lines.
Also, is FAR allowed? it would be great if it would

1) Do we post our entries in this thread?

2) February 28, 2013,right?
Yea you would post on this thread, but deadline ends by February 28, 2014

BEfore i break the spirit of the challenge..., you might want to ban atmospheric and electric engines aswell, or only allow the power of the wheels.

I was planning to do a jet car

BEfore i break the spirit of the challenge..., you might want to ban atmospheric and electric engines aswell, or only allow the power of the wheels.

I was planning to do a jet car

=D yea, I really should be more specific, I said rockets, thinking of jet engines as well, it would be tough though to use a jet car to navigate the space center.
